comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The former Alice Borland, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. J. Nelson Borland; she married Marshall Orme Wilson Jr., in 1910.  Her older sister Madeline married Clarence C. Pell the same year--both were society weddings featured in the New York Times.  Alice Borland Wilson was a significant art collector who made many gifts to art museums.
